titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation on the capital loss carryovers of individuals to $10,000.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation on the capital loss carryovers of individuals to $10,000.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase to $10,000 the limitation on the amount of losses from the sale or exchange of capital assets that an individual taxpayer may deduct in a taxable year beginning after December 31, 2007.
